reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater stylish with adorable pattern options, and appreciate its soft material and comfortable, non-itchy feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater, but not the right shape for my frame
items.body: I really loved this sweater. The material feels soft and cozy and comes across as good quality. The sleeves were my favorite part — roomy and cute without feeling bulky, which I appreciated. I wanted to keep it so bad, but the turtleneck gave me a bit of a boxy look that just didn’t flatter my frame personally. Aside from that, the color and checkered pattern are gorgeous and feel perfect for fall. I purchased this in a size Large. For reference, I’m 5’7, approximately 175–180 pounds, athletic build. Read more
items.author: Val Cannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater in every way!
items.body: I love this sweater! It’s so comfortable. I’ve worn it in the fall, and it’ll be great for winter as well. It’s true to size and fits great. I got the tan and white one. I love the mock style turtleneck. It is definitely worth it. I’d buy it again! Read more
items.author: Kendrick Bytheway

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty in Pink
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This turtleneck is such a cozy staple. The fabric is soft, comfortable, and not itchy at all, and the fit is flattering without feeling tight. It’s perfect for layering or wearing on its own, and it instantly makes an outfit look more put together. I love that it’s warm but not bulky, so it works great for everyday wear, errands, or casual outings. Definitely a fall/winter must-have. Read more
items.author: Samantha Lewise

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Cute and soft! Great quality! Read more
items.author: char

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5.0 out of 5.0 stars
items.body: I was genuinely impressed with this sweater! The material is soft but not flimsy, has a little stretch, and feels warm without being too heavy. The sizing chart was accurate — it fits me perfectly (true to measurements). Easy to put on and take off, and hasn’t pilled after washing. Great way to stay stylish but still stay warm during winter! Worth every penny! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sweaters worth 5 stars
items.body: Zesica sweaters are beautiful!! They are well-made. I like the bulky loose fit. 5‘4“ tall 107 pounds but I wear 34D and I love the loose fit. I love the way the sleeves gather around my wrist but blouses out in my arms. The material is lovely. I wash them in garment bags and let them air dry and they’re beautiful. Zesica is my go to for tops and sweaters. Read more
items.author: Karen Tynes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ZESICA Women’s 2025 (Fall Fashion Turtleneck)
items.body: I love this sweatshirt. I used it end of October in our Pathfinder Camporee and it is really cozy. The texture is so soft and still gives you warm. It is perfect in cold weather. I love also the style and the colors input. Very good to light and dark skin. Read more
items.author: Julie Ann Fabellar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress up or down
items.body: Love the color and fit. It does run a bit oversized. Quality is great with comfortable and soft fabric. Read more
items.author: Marisa Krieski

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Nutmeg, Apricot, Lightkhaki, Black, Camel, Orange, Eggplant, Darkblue, Blackplaid, Maple, Navystripe, Brownstripe, Ebony. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
